text: A jubilee is an anniversary of an event. It usually marks the 25th, 40th, 50th, 60th, or the 70th anniversary. In modern times, many monarchs have jubilees to celebrate a number of years that they have been on the throne. For example, in 2022, Elizabeth II celebrated her Platinum Jubilee (70 years). == Types of Jubilees == * Silver jubilee, for a 25th anniversary. * Ruby jubilee, for a 40th anniversary. * Golden jubilee, for a 50th anniversary. * Diamond jubilee, for a 60th anniversary. * Platinum jubilee, for a 70th anniversary. Category:Events
title: Jubilee
